thread.section_title: Park Hyatt New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beyond expectations
thread.title_full: Beyond expectations - Review of Park Hyatt New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jennifer H
title: Beyond expectations
text: The Park Hyatt far exceeded our expectations. The convenient location between 5th and 6th makes it a prime spot. From the moment we entered the hotel, every staff member gave us personal attention. Our room was so luxurious that we canceled our dinner plans to stay in. We offered complimentary breakfast for my husband's birthday which was delicous. This was the best one-night getaway we could have imagined.
